name: Curse Mountain
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Space - Jump

Enter - Pause

You must scale a mountain to prove your worth as a warrior, but the god of the mountain has other plans, and places a curse the entire mountain every 10 seconds.

Will you still be able to climb the mountain after you’ve been turned into a baby golem?

Entire game, assets and all, were made by @rpgwaker
